Description.Text: Best Western Ginkgo Sas Hotel is a stylish 4-star superior property offering contemporary accommodation in the heart of Hodmezovasarhely. Highlights include a 24-hour lobby bar, leisure and wellness facilities and an excellent location next to the Fekete Sas Events Center. Hodmezovasarhely is a small city situated in the southeast part of the Great Hungarian Plain. The streets around the downtown area are characterised by many ancient monuments, old statues and impressive buildings. Nearby places of interest include Kossuth Square, the Alfoldi Gallery and the Kokenydombi Venus. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Hodmezovasarhely destinations. The hotel occupies an elegant 4-storey building featuring a white facade. Facilities include a small gym, Jacuzzi and sauna. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are decorated in a contemporary style with warm, natural tones and wood furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, safe, air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the 24-hour lobby bar, which boasts a spacious terrace. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable underground parking is possible onsite.
